title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 185.6 - Calculation of percentages
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 185.6 - Calculation of percentages

State Regulations
(a) When the numerical count is marked on the container, percentages shall be
calculated on the basis of count. (b) When the minimum diameter or minimum and
maximum diameters are marked on the container, percentages shall be calculated
on the basis of weight. (c) When
the apples are in bulk, percentages shall be calculated on the basis of
weight. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
185.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
